title: 2 teens shot in Roseland
content:
A pair of teenage boys were shot in the Roseland neighborhood Tuesday evening on the Far South Side.
About 6:45 p.m., someone got out of a dark-colored vehicle and opened fire, hitting a 16-year-old in the shoulder and a 17-year-old in the calf as they walked through the 11400 block of South Eggleston, according to Chicago Police.
They were taken to Roseland Community Hospital in good condition, police said.
